                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The external service's unique ID. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>kind</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceKind"><code>ExternalServiceKind!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The kind of external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>displayName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The display name of the external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>config</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-JSONCString"><code>JSONCString!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The JSON configuration of the external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>createdAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> When the external service was created. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> When the external service was last updated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repoCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repos synced by the external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>webhookURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> An optional URL that will be populated when webhooks have been configured for the external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>warning</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> This is an optional field that's populated when we ran into errors on the backend side when trying to create/update an ExternalService, but the create/update still succeeded. It is a field on ExternalService instead of a separate thing in order to not break the API and stay backwards compatible. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastSyncError</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> External services are synced with code hosts in the background. This optional field will contain any errors that occurred during the most recent completed sync. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastSyncAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> LastSyncAt is the time the last sync job was run for this code host. Null if it has never been synced so far. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nextSyncAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The timestamp of the next sync job. Null if not scheduled for a re-sync. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>webhookLogs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-WebhookLogConnection"><code>WebhookLogConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>Returns recently received webhooks on this external service.</p>
                        <p>Only site admins may access this field.</p>
                        <p>DEPRECATED: Webhook logs linked directly to an external service will be removed. See <a href="https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/config/webhooks/incoming#deprecation-notice">https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/config/webhooks/incoming#deprecation-notice</a></p>
                        <span class="deprecation-reason">Webhook logs linked directly to an external service will be removed. See <a href="https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/config/webhooks/incoming#deprecation-notice">https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/config/webhooks/incoming#deprecation-notice</a></span>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n webhook logs.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Opaque pagination cursor.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>onlyErrors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs that resulted in errors.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>since</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs on or after this time.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>until</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs on or before this time.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>syncJobs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceSyncJobConnection"><code>ExternalServiceSyncJobConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The list of recent sync jobs for this external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>checkConnection</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceAvailability"><code>ExternalServiceAvailability!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Checks the availability of the external service. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>hasConnectionCheck</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>True if this external service can perform availability check by running checkConnection.</p>
                        <p>If this is false, then checkConnection responds with ExternalServiceAvailabilityUnknown.</p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>supportsRepoExclusion</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> True if this external service configuration supports <code>exclude</code> parameter. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>

        <section id="definition-ExternalServiceAvailability" class="definition definition-union" data-traverse-target="definition-ExternalServiceAvailability">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">ExternalServiceAvailability</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Availability status of an external service for diagnostic purposes.</p>
                <p>This is so that the UI can surface whether the external service can serve requests, and if not, why is the reason for that.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">

                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Union Types</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceAvailable"><code>ExternalServiceAvailable</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceUnavailable"><code>ExternalServiceUnavailable</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceAvailabilityUnknown"><code>ExternalServiceAvailabilityUnknown</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-gql"><span class="hljs-symbol">ExternalServiceAvailable</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-ExternalServiceSyncJob" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-ExternalServiceSyncJob">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">ExternalServiceSyncJob</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>An external service sync job represents one sync with the code host. It&#39;s a background job that will eventually be run by the repo syncer.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique identifier of the sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>state</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceSyncJobState"><code>ExternalServiceSyncJobState!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The current state of the sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>queuedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> When the sync job was added to the queue. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>startedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Set when sync begins. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>finishedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Set when sync finished. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>failureMessage</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Error message, if the sync failed. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reposSynced</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repos synced during this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repoSyncErrors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of times an error occurred syncing a repo during this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reposAdded</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of new repos discovered during this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reposDeleted</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repos deleted as a result of this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reposModified</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of existing repos whose metadata has changed during this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reposUnmodified</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of existing repos whose metadata did not change during this sync job. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">4</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"state"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"QUEUED"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"queuedAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"startedAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"finishedAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"failureMessage"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reposSynced"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repoSyncErrors"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reposAdded"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reposDeleted"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reposModified"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reposUnmodified"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-ExternalServiceSyncJobState" class="definition definition-enum" data-traverse-target="definition-ExternalServiceSyncJobState">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">ExternalServiceSyncJobState</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>The possible states of an external service sync job.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Values</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Enum Value</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>QUEUED</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> Not yet started. Will be picked up by a worker eventually. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>PROCESSING</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> Currently syncing. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>ERRORED</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> An error occurred while syncing. Will be retried eventually. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>FAILED</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> A fatal error occurred while syncing. No retries will be made. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>COMPLETED</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> Sync finished successfully. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>CANCELING</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> Sync job is being canceled. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><code>CANCELED</code></p>
                      </td>
                      <td> Sync job has been canceled. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-gql"><span class="hljs-symbol">"QUEUED"</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>

        <section id="definition-FeatureFlagRollout" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-FeatureFlagRollout">

        <section id="definition-File2" class="definition definition-interface" data-traverse-target="definition-File2">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">File2</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A file. In a future version of Sourcegraph, a repository&#39;s files may be distinct from a repository&#39;s blobs (for example, to support searching/browsing generated files that aren&#39;t committed and don&#39;t exist as Git blobs). Clients should generally use the GitBlob concrete type and GitCommit.blobs (not GitCommit.files), unless they explicitly want to opt-in to different behavior in the future. INTERNAL: This is temporarily named File2 during a migration. Do not refer to the name File2 in any API clients as the name will change soon.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties definition-fields doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full path (relative to the root) of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base name (i.e., file name only) of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isDirectory</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> False because this is a file, not a directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>content</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The content of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return file content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return file content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>byteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file size in bytes. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Total line count for the file. Returns 0 for binary files. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>binary</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not it is binary. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>richHTML</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file rendered as rich HTML, or an empty string if it is not a supported rich file type. This HTML string is already escaped and thus is always safe to render. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this file (using the input revision specifier, which may not be immutable). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The canonical URL to this file (using an immutable revision specifier). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this file on external services. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>highlight</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightedFile"><code>HighlightedFile!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Highlight the file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>disableTimeout</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>highlightLongLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>If highlightLongLines is true, lines which are longer than 2000 bytes are highlighted. 2000 bytes is enabled. This may produce a significant amount of HTML which some browsers (such as Chrome, but not Firefox) may have trouble rendering efficiently.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>format</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightResponseFormat"><code>HighlightResponseFormat</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Specifies which format/highlighting technique to use.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return highlight content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return blob highlight ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties definition-possible-types doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Possible Types</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>File2 Types</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-VirtualFile"><code>VirtualFile</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-GitBlob"><code>GitBlob</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"isDirectory"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"byteSize"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalLines"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"binary"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"richHTML"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"canonicalURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"externalURLs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ExternalLink</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"highlight"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">HighlightedFile</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>

        <section id="definition-FileDiff" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-FileDiff">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">FileDiff</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A diff for a single file.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>oldPath</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The old (original) path of the file, or null if the file was added. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>oldFile</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-File2"><code>File2</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The old file, or null if the file was created (oldFile.path == oldPath). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>newPath</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The new (changed) path of the file, or null if the file was deleted. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>newFile</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-File2"><code>File2</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The new file, or null if the file was deleted (newFile.path == newPath). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>mostRelevantFile</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-File2"><code>File2!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The old file (if the file was deleted) and otherwise the new file. This file field is typically used by clients that want to show a "View" link to the file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>hunks</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-FileDiffHunk"><code>[FileDiffHunk!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Hunks that were changed from old to new. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>stat</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DiffStat"><code>DiffStat!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The diff stat for the whole file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>internalID</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. An identifier for the file diff that is unique among all other file diffs in the list that contains it. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"oldPath"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"oldFile"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">File2</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"newPath"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"newFile"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">File2</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"mostRelevantFile"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">File2</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"hunks"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">FileDiffHunk</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"stat"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">DiffStat</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"internalID"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>

        </section>
        <section id="definition-FileDiffConnection" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-FileDiffConnection">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">FileDiffConnection</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A list of file diffs.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nodes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-FileDiff"><code>[FileDiff!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of file diffs. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The total count of file diffs in the connection, if available. This total count may be larger than the number of nodes in this object when the result is paginated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>pageInfo</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-PageInfo"><code>PageInfo!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Pagination information. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>diffStat</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DiffStat"><code>DiffStat!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The diff stat for the file diffs in this object, which may be a subset of the entire diff if the result is paginated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>rawDiff</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The raw diff for the file diffs in this object, which may be a subset of the entire diff if the result is paginated. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"nodes"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">FileDiff</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"pageInfo"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">PageInfo</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"diffStat"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">DiffStat</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"rawDiff"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-FileDiffHunk" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-FileDiffHunk">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">FileDiffHunk</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A changed region (&quot;hunk&quot;) in a file diff.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>oldRange</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-FileDiffHunkRange"><code>FileDiffHunkRange!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The range of the old file that the hunk applies to. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>oldNoNewlineAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the old file had a trailing newline. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>newRange</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-FileDiffHunkRange"><code>FileDiffHunkRange!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The range of the new file that the hunk applies to. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>section</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The diff hunk section heading, if any. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>body</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The hunk body, with lines prefixed with '-', '+', or ' '. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>highlight</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightedDiffHunkBody"><code>HighlightedDiffHunkBody!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Highlight the hunk. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>disableTimeout</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>highlightLongLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>If highlightLongLines is true, lines which are longer than 2000 bytes are highlighted. 2000 bytes is enabled. This may produce a significant amount of HTML which some browsers (such as Chrome, but not Firefox) may have trouble rendering efficiently.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>format</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightResponseFormat"><code>HighlightResponseFormat</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Specifies which format/highlighting technique to use.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"oldRange"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">FileDiffHunkRange</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"oldNoNewlineAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"newRange"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">FileDiffHunkRange</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"section"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"highlight"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">HighlightedDiffHunkBody</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-FileMatch" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-FileMatch">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">FileMatch</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A file match.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>file</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitBlob"><code>GitBlob!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file containing the match. KNOWN ISSUE: This file's "commit" field contains incomplete data. KNOWN ISSUE: This field's type should be File! not GitBlob!. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository containing the file match. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>revSpec</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevSpec"><code>GitRevSpec</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The revspec of the revision that contains this match. If no revspec was given (such as when no repository filter or revspec is specified in the search query), it is null. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbols</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Symbol"><code>[Symbol!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The symbols found in this file that match the query. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lineMatches</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-LineMatch"><code>[LineMatch!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The line matches. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>chunkMatches</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ChunkMatch"><code>[ChunkMatch!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> EXPERIMENTAL: This field is experimental and may be unstable. The chunk matches. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>limitHit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not the limit was hit. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"file"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitBlob</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"revSpec"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRef</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"symbols"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Symbol</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"lineMatches"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">LineMatch</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"chunkMatches"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ChunkMatch</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"limitHit"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-GenericSearchResultInterface" class="definition definition-interface" data-traverse-target="definition-GenericSearchResultInterface">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>

          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A search result. Every type of search result, except FileMatch, must implement this interface.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties definition-fields doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>label</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Markdown"><code>Markdown!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A markdown string that is rendered prominently. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL of the result. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>detail</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Markdown"><code>Markdown!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A markdown string that is rendered less prominently. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>matches</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SearchResultMatch"><code>[SearchResultMatch!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of matches in this search result. </td>

                <h5>Possible Types</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>GenericSearchResultInterface Types</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-CommitSearchResult"><code>CommitSearchResult</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <p><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository</code></a></p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
