                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"label"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Markdown</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"detail"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Markdown</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"matches"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">SearchResultMatch</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-GitBlob" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitBlob">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitBlob</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git blob in a repository.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full path (relative to the repository root) of this blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base name (i.e., file name only) of this blob's path. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isDirectory</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> False because this is a blob (file), not a directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>content</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The content of this blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return blob content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return blob content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>byteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file size in bytes. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Total line count for the Blob. Returns 0 for binary files. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>binary</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not it is binary. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>richHTML</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The blob contents rendered as rich HTML, or an empty string if it is not a supported rich file type. This HTML string is already escaped and thus is always safe to render. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>commit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>GitCommit!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git commit containing this blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository containing this Git blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this blob (using the input revision specifier, which may not be immutable). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The canonical URL to this blob (using an immutable revision specifier). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this blob on its repository's external services. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>blame</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Hunk"><code>[Hunk!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Blame the blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>highlight</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightedFile"><code>HighlightedFile!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Highlight the blob contents. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>disableTimeout</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>highlightLongLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>If highlightLongLines is true, lines which are longer than 2000 bytes are highlighted. 2000 bytes is enabled. This may produce a significant amount of HTML which some browsers (such as Chrome, but not Firefox) may have trouble rendering efficiently.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>format</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightResponseFormat"><code>HighlightResponseFormat</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Specifies which format/highlighting technique to use.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return highlight content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return highlight content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>submodule</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Submodule"><code>Submodule</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Submodule metadata if this tree points to a submodule </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbols</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SymbolConnection"><code>SymbolConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Symbols defined in this blob. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n symbols from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return symbols matching the query.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbol</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Symbol"><code>Symbol</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> (Experimental) Symbol defined in this blob at the specific line number and character offset. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>line</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The line number (0-based).</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>character</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The character offset (0-based). The offset is measured in characters, not bytes.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Always false, since a blob is a file, not directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n files in the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursiveSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees of single-child directories</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lfs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-LFS"><code>LFS</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> LFS is set if the GitBlob is a pointer to a file stored in LFS. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"isDirectory"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"byteSize"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalLines"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"binary"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"richHTML"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commit"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitCommit</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"canonicalURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"externalURLs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ExternalLink</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"blame"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Hunk</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"highlight"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">HighlightedFile</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"submodule"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Submodule</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>

  <span class="hljs-attr">"symbol"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Symbol</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"isSingleChild"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"lfs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">LFS</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>

                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-GitCommit" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitCommit">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitCommit</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git commit.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The globally addressable ID for this commit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository that contains this commit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>oid</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitObjectID"><code>GitObjectID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> This commit's Git object ID (OID), a 40-character SHA-1 hash. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>abbreviatedOID</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The abbreviated form of this commit's OID. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>author</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Signature"><code>Signature!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> This commit's author. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>committer</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Signature"><code>Signature</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> This commit's committer, if any. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>message</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full commit message. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>subject</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The first line of the commit message. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>body</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The contents of the commit message after the first line. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>parents</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>[GitCommit!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Parent commits of this commit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this commit (using the input revision specifier, which may not be immutable). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The canonical URL to this commit (using an immutable revision specifier). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this commit on its repository's external services. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitTreeOrBlob"><code>GitTreeOrBlob</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git tree or blob in this commit at the given path. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The path of the tree or blob.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>tree</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitTree"><code>GitTree</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git tree in this commit at the given path. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The path of the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Whether to recurse into sub-trees. If true, it overrides the value of the &quot;recursive&quot; parameter on all of GitTree&#39;s fields. DEPRECATED: Use the &quot;recursive&quot; parameter on GitTree&#39;s fields instead.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>fileNames</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>[String!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of file names in this repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>blob</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitBlob"><code>GitBlob</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git blob in this commit at the given path. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>file</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-File2"><code>File2</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file at the given path for this commit. See "File" documentation for the difference between this field and the "blob" field. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>languages</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>[String!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Lists the programming languages present in the tree at this commit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>languageStatistics</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-LanguageStatistics"><code>[LanguageStatistics!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> List statistics for each language present in the repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>ancestors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommitConnection"><code>GitCommitConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The log of commits consisting of this commit and its ancestors. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n commits from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return commits that match the query.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return commits that affect the path.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>follow</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Follow history beyond renames (only works for a single file).</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return commits more recent than the specified date.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>afterCursor</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Skip the first N commits of the repo before returning the number of commits as set in the field &quot;first&quot;.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>before</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return commits older than the specified date.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>behindAhead</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BehindAheadCounts"><code>BehindAheadCounts!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Returns the number of commits that this commit is behind and ahead of revspec. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>revspec</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbols</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SymbolConnection"><code>SymbolConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Symbols defined as of this commit. (All symbols, not just symbols that were newly defined in this commit.) </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n symbols from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return symbols matching the query.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>includePatterns</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>[String!]</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>A list of regular expressions, all of which must match all file paths returned in the list.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>diff</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepositoryComparison"><code>RepositoryComparison!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Returns the comparison with another revision. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>base</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The base commit to compare to. Defaults to the commit&#39;s first parent.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">4</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"oid"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitObjectID</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"abbreviatedOID"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Signature</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"committer"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Signature</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"message"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"subject"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"parents"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">GitCommit</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"canonicalURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"externalURLs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ExternalLink</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitTree</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"tree"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitTree</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"fileNames"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"blob"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitBlob</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"file"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">File2</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"languages"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"languageStatistics"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">LanguageStatistics</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"ancestors"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitCommitConnection</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"behindAhead"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">BehindAheadCounts</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"symbols"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">SymbolConnection</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"diff"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">RepositoryComparison</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-GitCommitConnection" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitCommitConnection">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitCommitConnection</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A list of Git commits.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nodes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>[GitCommit!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of Git commits. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The total number of Git commits in the connection. If the GitCommitConnection is paginated (e.g., because a "first" parameter was provided to the field that produced it), this field is null to avoid it taking unexpectedly long to compute the total count. Remove the pagination parameters to obtain a non-null value for this field. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>pageInfo</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-PageInfo"><code>PageInfo!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Pagination information. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>

                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"nodes"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">GitCommit</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"pageInfo"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">PageInfo</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-GitRef" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitRef">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitRef</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git ref.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The globally addressable ID for the Git ref. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full ref name (e.g., "refs/heads/mybranch" or "refs/tags/mytag"). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>abbrevName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> An unambiguous short name for the ref. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>displayName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The display name of the ref. For branches ("refs/heads/foo"), this is the branch name ("foo"). As a special case, for GitHub pull request refs of the form refs/pull/NUMBER/head, this is "NUMBER". </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>prefix</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The prefix of the ref, either "", "refs/", "refs/heads/", "refs/pull/", or "refs/tags/". This prefix is always a prefix of the ref's name. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>type</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefType"><code>GitRefType!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The type of this Git ref. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>target</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitObject"><code>GitObject!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The object that the ref points to. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The associated repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this Git ref. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"4"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"abbrevName"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"displayName"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"prefix"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"GIT_BRANCH"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"target"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitObject</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>

              </div>

        <section id="definition-GitRevisionRange" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitRevisionRange">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitRevisionRange</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git revision range of the form &quot;base..head&quot; or &quot;base...head&quot;. Other revision range formats are not supported.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>expr</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git revision range expression of the form "base..head" or "base...head". </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>base</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevSpec"><code>GitRevSpec!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base (left-hand side) of the range. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>baseRevSpec</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevSpecExpr"><code>GitRevSpecExpr!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base's revspec as an expression. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>head</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevSpec"><code>GitRevSpec!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The head (right-hand side) of the range. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>headRevSpec</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevSpecExpr"><code>GitRevSpecExpr!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The head's revspec as an expression. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>mergeBase</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitObject"><code>GitObject</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The merge-base of the base and head revisions, if this is a "base...head" revision range. If this is a "base..head" revision range, then this field is null. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"expr"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"base"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRef</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"baseRevSpec"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRevSpecExpr</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"head"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRef</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"headRevSpec"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRevSpecExpr</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"mergeBase"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitObject</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-GitTree" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-GitTree">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">GitTree</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git tree in a repository.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full path (relative to the root) of this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isRoot</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether this tree is the root (top-level) tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base name (i.e., last path component only) of this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isDirectory</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> True because this is a directory. (The value differs for other TreeEntry interface implementations, such as File.) </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>commit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>GitCommit!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git commit containing this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository containing this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this tree (using the input revision specifier, which may not be immutable). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The canonical URL to this tree (using an immutable revision specifier). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this tree on external services. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>rawZipArchiveURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this entry's raw contents as a Zip archive. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>submodule</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Submodule"><code>Submodule</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Submodule metadata if this tree points to a submodule </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>directories</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitTree"><code>[GitTree!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of directories in this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n files in the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>files</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-File"><code>[File!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of files in this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n files in the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>entries</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-TreeEntry"><code>[TreeEntry!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of entries in this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n files in the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees. If true, implies recursiveSingleChild.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursiveSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees of single-child directories. If true, we return a flat list of every directory that is a single child, and any directories or files that are nested in a single child.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>ancestors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Includes all parent directories and their entries. For example, if the path is <code>/client/web/something</code>, it will return the following entries in this order:</p>
                              <ul>
                                <li><code>/*</code></li>
                                <li><code>/client/*</code></li>
                                <li><code>/client/web/*</code></li>
                                <li><code>/client/web/something/*</code></li>
                              </ul>
                              <p>This is useful for rendering a collapsed tree view for the entry.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbols</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SymbolConnection"><code>SymbolConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Symbols defined in this tree. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n symbols from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return symbols matching the query.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether this tree entry is a single child </td>

              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>The <code>ID</code> scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as <code>&quot;4&quot;</code>) or integer (such as <code>4</code>) input value will be accepted as an ID.</p>

                <html>

</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
