        <section id="definition-KeyPathSegment" class="definition definition-input-object" data-traverse-target="definition-KeyPathSegment">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">KeyPathSegment</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A segment of a key path that locates a nested JSON value in a root JSON value. Exactly one field in each KeyPathSegment must be non-null. For example, in {&quot;a&quot;: [0, {&quot;b&quot;: 3}]}, the value 3 is located at the key path [&quot;a&quot;, 1, &quot;b&quot;].</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Input Field</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <span class="property-name"><code>property</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The name of the property in the object at this location to descend into. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>
                        <span class="property-name"><code>index</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The index of the array at this location to descend into. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-attr">"property"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">"index"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-MirrorRepositoryInfo" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-MirrorRepositoryInfo">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">MirrorRepositoryInfo</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Information and status about the mirroring of a repository. In this case, the remote source repository is external to Sourcegraph and the mirror is maintained by the Sourcegraph site (not the other way around).</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>remoteURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL of the remote source repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloneInProgress</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the clone of the repository has begun but not yet completed. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloneProgress</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A single line of text that contains progress information for the running clone command. The format of the progress text is not specified. It is intended to be displayed directly to a user. e.g. "Receiving objects: 95% (2041/2148), 292.01 KiB | 515.00 KiB/s" "Resolving deltas: 9% (117/1263)" </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloned</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository has ever been successfully cloned. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isCorrupted</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository is currently corrupt. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>corruptionLogs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepoCorruptionLog"><code>[RepoCorruptionLog!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A Log of the corruption events that have been detected on this repository. Only 10 events are kept and the events are ordered from most recent to least. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> When the repository was last successfully updated from the remote source repository.. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updateSchedule</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-UpdateSchedule"><code>UpdateSchedule</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The state of this repository in the update schedule. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updateQueue</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-UpdateQueue"><code>UpdateQueue</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The state of this repository in the update queue. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastError</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The last error message, if any, returned when fetching or cloning the repo </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>byteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BigInt"><code>BigInt!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The byte size of the repo. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>shard</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The gitserver shard on which the repository is or will be cloned. Only site admins can access this field. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"remoteURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloneInProgress"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloneProgress"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloned"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"isCorrupted"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"corruptionLogs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">RepoCorruptionLog</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updatedAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updateSchedule"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">UpdateSchedule</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updateQueue"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">UpdateQueue</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"lastError"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"byteSize"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"shard"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-MonitoringAlert" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-MonitoringAlert">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">MonitoringAlert</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A high-level monitoring alert, for details see <a href="https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/observability/metrics#high-level-alerting-metrics">https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/observability/metrics#high-level-alerting-metrics</a></p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>timestamp</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> End time of this event, which describes the past 12h of recorded data. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Name of alert that the service fired. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>serviceName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Name of the service that fired the alert. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>owner</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Owner of the fired alert. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>average</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Float"><code>Float!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Average percentage of time (between [0, 1]) that the event was firing over the 12h of recorded data. e.g. 1.0 if it was firing 100% of the time on average during that 12h window, 0.5 if it was firing 50% of the time on average, etc. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"timestamp"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"serviceName"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"owner"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"average"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987.65</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

                <p>A namespace is a container for certain types of data and settings, such as a user or organization.</p>
              </div>

                  </thead>

                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The globally unique ID of this namespace. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>namespaceName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The name of this namespace's component. For a user, this is the username. For an organization, this is the organization name. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>

          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">Org</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>An organization, which is a group of users.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>executorSecrets</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExecutorSecretConnection"><code>ExecutorSecretConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The list of all available executor secrets for execution in this orgs namespace. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>scope</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExecutorSecretScope"><code>ExecutorSecretScope!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The scope for which secrets shall be returned.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only return N records.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Opaque cursor for pagination.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique ID for the organization. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The organization's name. This is unique among all organizations on this Sourcegraph site. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>displayName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The organization's chosen display name. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>createdAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The date when the organization was created. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>members</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-NewUsersConnection"><code>NewUsersConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of users who are members of this organization. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The limit argument for forward pagination.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>last</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The limit argument for backward pagination.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The cursor argument for forward pagination.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>before</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The cursor argument for backward pagination.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return users whose usernames or display names match the query.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>latestSettings</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Settings"><code>Settings</code></a></span>
                      </td>

                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>settingsCascade</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SettingsCascade"><code>SettingsCascade!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> All settings for this organization, and the individual levels in the settings cascade (global &gt; organization) that were merged to produce the final merged settings. Only organization members and site admins can access this field. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>configurationCascade</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ConfigurationCascade"><code>ConfigurationCascade!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED <span class="deprecation-reason">Use settingsCascade instead. This field is a deprecated alias for it and will be removed in a future release.</span>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>viewerPendingInvitation</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-OrganizationInvitation"><code>OrganizationInvitation</code></a></span>

                    <tr>

                      </td>

        <section id="definition-OutOfBandMigration" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-OutOfBandMigration">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">OutOfBandMigration</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>An out-of-band migration is a process that runs in the background of the instance that moves data from one format into another format. Out-of-band migrations</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique identifier of this migration. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>team</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The team that owns this migration (e.g., code-intelligence). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>component</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The component this migration affects (e.g., codeintel-db.lsif_data_documents). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>description</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A human-readable summary of the migration. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>introduced</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>The Sourcegraph version in which this migration was introduced. The format of this version includes only major and minor parts separated by a dot. The patch version can always be assumed to be zero as we&#39;ll never introduce or deprecate an out-of-band migration within a patch release.</p>
                        <p>It is necessary to completely this migration in reverse (if destructive) before downgrading to or past this version. Otherwise, the previous instance version will not be aware of the new data format.</p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>deprecated</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>The Sourcegraph version by which this migration is assumed to have completed. The format of this version mirrors introduced and includes only major and minor parts separated by a dot.</p>
                        <p>It is necessary to have completed this migration before upgrading to or past this version. Otherwise, the next instance version will no longer be aware of the old data format.</p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>progress</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Float"><code>Float!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The progress of the migration (in the forward direction). In the range [0, 1]. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>created</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The time the migration record was inserted. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastUpdated</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The last time the migration progress or error list was updated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nonDestructive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> If false, the migration moves data destructively, and a previous version of Sourcegraph will encounter errors when interfacing with the target data unless the migration is first run in reverse prior to a downgrade. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>applyReverse</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> If true, the migration will run in reverse. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>errors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-OutOfBandMigrationError"><code>[OutOfBandMigrationError!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of errors that have occurred while performing this migration (in either direction). This list is bounded by a maximum size, and older errors will replaced by newer errors as the list capacity is reached. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">4</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"team"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"component"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>

                      </td>

                    </tr>
                    <tr>

        <section id="definition-ProductLicenseInfo" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-ProductLicenseInfo">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">ProductLicenseInfo</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Information about this site&#39;s product license (which activates certain Sourcegraph features).</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>productNameWithBrand</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full name of the product that this license is for. To get the product name for the current Sourcegraph site, use ProductSubscriptionStatus.productNameWithBrand instead (to handle cases where there is no license). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>tags</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>[String!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Tags indicating the product plan and features activated by this license. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>userCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of users allowed by this license. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>expiresAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The date when this license expires. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"productNameWithBrand"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"tags"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"userCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"expiresAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-ProductSubscriptionStatus" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-ProductSubscriptionStatus">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">ProductSubscriptionStatus</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Information about this site&#39;s product subscription (which enables access to and renewals of a product license).</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>productNameWithBrand</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full name of the product in use, such as "Sourcegraph Enterprise". </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>actualUserCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The max number of user accounts that have been active on this Sourcegraph site for the current license. If no license is in use, returns zero. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>actualUserCountDate</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The date and time when the max number of user accounts that have been active on this Sourcegraph site for the current license was reached. If no license is in use, returns an empty string. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>maximumAllowedUserCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of users allowed. If there is a license, this is equal to ProductLicenseInfo.userCount. Otherwise, it is the user limit for instances without a license, or null if there is no limit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>noLicenseWarningUserCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of free users allowed on a site without a license before a warning is shown to all users, or null if a valid license is in use. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>license</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ProductLicenseInfo"><code>ProductLicenseInfo</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The product license associated with this subscription, if any. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"productNameWithBrand"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"actualUserCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"actualUserCountDate"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"maximumAllowedUserCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"noLicenseWarningUserCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"license"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">ProductLicenseInfo</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-RandomizeUserPasswordResult" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RandomizeUserPasswordResult">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RandomizeUserPasswordResult</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>The result for Mutation.randomizeUserPassword.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>resetPasswordURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>The reset password URL that the user must visit to sign into their account again. If the builtin username-password authentication provider is not enabled, this field&#39;s value is null.</p>
                        <p>If email sending (SMTP) is configured on this instance, an email containing this URL will also be sent to the primary email address associated with the user.</p>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>emailSent</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> If true, then an email with the password reset URL was sent to the primary email address associated with the user. If false, email sending (SMTP) might not be configured on this instance, or an error may have occurred - check the error logs with log scope 'randomizeUserPassword' for more details. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"resetPasswordURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"emailSent"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-Range" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-Range">

                      </td>
                      <td> The start position of the range (inclusive). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>end</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Position"><code>Position!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The end position of the range (exclusive). </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>

</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-RegistryExtension" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RegistryExtension">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RegistryExtension</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>An extension&#39;s listing in the extension registry.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique, opaque, permanent ID of the extension. Do not display this ID to the user; display RegistryExtension.extensionID instead (it is friendlier and still unique, but it can be renamed). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>extensionID</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The qualified, unique name that refers to this extension, consisting of the registry name (if non-default), publisher's name, and the extension's name, all joined by "/" (for example, "acme-corp/my-extension-name"). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>manifest</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExtensionManifest"><code>ExtensionManifest</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The extension manifest, or null if none is set. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">4</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"extensionID"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"manifest"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">ExtensionManifest</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
