        <section id="definition-RepoCorruptionLog" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepoCorruptionLog">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepoCorruptionLog</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A corruption log entry that that records the time of when corruption was detected and a reason why the repo is regarded as corrupt</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>timestamp</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The time at which the repository was detected to be corrupt </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>reason</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The reason why this repository was regarded as corrupt </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"timestamp"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"reason"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-Repository" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-Repository">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">Repository</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A repository is a Git source control repository that is mirrored from some origin code host.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's unique ID. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td>
                        <p>The repository&#39;s name, as a path with one or more components. It conventionally consists of the repository&#39;s hostname and path (joined by &quot;/&quot;), minus any suffixes (such as &quot;.git&quot;). Examples:</p>
                        <ul>
                          <li>github.com/foo/bar</li>
                          <li>my-code-host.example.com/myrepo</li>
                          <li>myrepo</li>
                        </ul>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>uri</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED: Use name. <span class="deprecation-reason">Use name.</span>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>description</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's description. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>language</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The primary programming language in the repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>createdAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED: This field is unused in known clients. The date when this repository was created on Sourcegraph. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED: This field is unused in known clients. The date when this repository's metadata was last updated on Sourcegraph. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>commit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>GitCommit</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Returns information about the given commit in the repository, or null if no commit exists with the given rev. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>rev</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The Git revision specifier (revspec) for the commit.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>inputRevspec</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Optional input revspec used to construct non-canonical URLs and other &quot;friendly&quot; field values. Used by clients that must ensure consistency of revision resolution within a session/request (so they use full SHAs) but also preserve the user input rev (for user friendliness).</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>firstEverCommit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommit"><code>GitCommit</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The first commit inside the repo </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>mirrorInfo</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-MirrorRepositoryInfo"><code>MirrorRepositoryInfo!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Information and status related to mirroring, if this repository is a mirror of another repository (e.g., on some code host). In this case, the remote source repository is external to Sourcegraph and the mirror is maintained by the Sourcegraph site (not the other way around). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalRepository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalRepository"><code>ExternalRepository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Information about this repository from the external service that it originates from (such as GitHub, GitLab, Phabricator, etc.). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isFork</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository is a fork. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isArchived</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository has been archived. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isPrivate</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository is private. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalServices</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceConnection"><code>ExternalServiceConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Lists all external services which yield this repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n external services from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>cloneInProgress</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the repository is currently being cloned. <span class="deprecation-reason">use Repository.mirrorInfo.cloneInProgress instead</span>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>textSearchIndex</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepositoryTextSearchIndex"><code>RepositoryTextSearchIndex</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Information about the text search index for this repository, or null if text search indexing is not enabled or supported for this repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this repository on external services associated with it. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>defaultBranch</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRef"><code>GitRef</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's default Git branch (HEAD symbolic ref). If the repository is currently being cloned or is empty, this field will be null. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>gitRefs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefConnection"><code>GitRefConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's Git refs. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n Git refs from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return Git refs whose names match the query.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>type</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefType"><code>GitRefType</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return only Git refs of the given type. Known issue: It is only supported to retrieve Git branch and tag refs, not other Git refs.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>orderBy</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefOrder"><code>GitRefOrder</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Ordering for Git refs in the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>interactive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Ordering is an expensive operation that doesn&#39;t scale for lots of references. If this is true we fallback on not ordering. This should never be false in interactive API requests.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>branches</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefConnection"><code>GitRefConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's Git branches. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n Git branches from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return Git branches whose names match the query.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>orderBy</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefOrder"><code>GitRefOrder</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Ordering for Git branches in the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>interactive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Ordering is an expensive operation that doesn&#39;t scale for lots of references. If this is true we fallback on not ordering. This should never be false in interactive API requests.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>tags</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRefConnection"><code>GitRefConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's Git tags. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n Git tags from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return Git tags whose names match the query.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>comparison</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepositoryComparison"><code>RepositoryComparison!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A Git comparison in this repository between a base and head commit. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>base</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The base of the diff (&quot;old&quot; or &quot;left-hand side&quot;), or &quot;HEAD&quot; if not specified.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>head</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The head of the diff (&quot;new&quot; or &quot;right-hand side&quot;), or &quot;HEAD&quot; if not specified.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>fetchMissing</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Attempt to fetch missing revisions from remote if they are not found</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>contributors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepositoryContributorConnection"><code>RepositoryContributorConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository's contributors. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>revisionRange</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The Git revision range to compute contributors in.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>afterDate</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>The date after which to count contributions.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return contributors to files in this path.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n contributors from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>last</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>before</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>viewerCanAdminister</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the viewer has admin privileges on this repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>label</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Markdown"><code>Markdown!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A markdown string that is rendered prominently. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>detail</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Markdown"><code>Markdown!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A markdown string of that is rendered less prominently. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>matches</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SearchResultMatch"><code>[SearchResultMatch!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The result previews of the result. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>codeIntelligenceCommitGraph</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-CodeIntelligenceCommitGraph"><code>CodeIntelligenceCommitGraph!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Information and status related to the commit graph of this repository calculated for use by code intelligence features. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>stars</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The star count the repository has in the code host. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>keyValuePairs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-KeyValuePair"><code>[KeyValuePair!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A set of user-defined key-value pairs associated with the repo. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>diskSizeBytes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BigInt"><code>BigInt</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The size of repo when cloned on disk </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>

        <section id="definition-RepositoryComparison" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryComparison">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepositoryComparison</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>The differences between two concrete Git commits in a repository.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>baseRepository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository that is the base (left-hand side) of this comparison. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>headRepository</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>Repository!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The repository that is the head (right-hand side) of this comparison. Cross-repository comparisons are not yet supported, so this is always equal to RepositoryComparison.baseRepository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>range</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRevisionRange"><code>GitRevisionRange!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The range that this comparison represents. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>commits</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommitConnection"><code>GitCommitConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The commits in the comparison range, excluding the base and including the head. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return the first n commits from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Filter to only the commits that modify files that match path. Path can be either a file or a containing directory.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>fileDiffs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-FileDiffConnection"><code>FileDiffConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file diffs for each changed file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return the first n file diffs from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return file diffs after the given cursor.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>paths</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>[String!]</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>A list of paths or directories used to filter the diffs</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"baseRepository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"headRepository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"range"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRevisionRange</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commits"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitCommitConnection</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"fileDiffs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">FileDiffConnection</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-RepositoryContributor" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryContributor">

                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>

                      </td>
                      <td> The personal information for the contributor. </td>
                    </tr>

                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>count</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>

                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>commits</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitCommitConnection"><code>GitCommitConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>

                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">

                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">

                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return the first n commits.</p>

                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">

                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"person"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Person</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"count"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commits"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitCommitConnection</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>

            </div>

        <section id="definition-RepositoryContributorConnection" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryContributorConnection">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepositoryContributorConnection</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A list of contributors to a repository.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nodes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-RepositoryContributor"><code>[RepositoryContributor!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of contributors to a repository. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The total count of contributors in the connection, if available. This total count may be larger than the number of nodes in this object when the result is paginated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>pageInfo</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BidirectionalPageInfo"><code>BidirectionalPageInfo!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Pagination information. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>

        <section id="definition-RepositoryStats" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryStats">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepositoryStats</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY: A repository statistic</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>gitDirBytes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BigInt"><code>BigInt!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The amount of bytes stored in .git directories </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexedLinesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BigInt"><code>BigInt!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of lines indexed </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>total</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of all repositories in the instance, without soft-deleted or blocked repositories. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloned</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of cloned repositories in the instance. This number might be higher than 'total', if soft-deleted repositories haven't been cleaned up yet. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloning</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repositories in the instance that are currently being cloned. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>notCloned</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repositories in the instance that not cloned yet. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>failedFetch</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repositories where initial cloning or subsequent fetching resulted in an error. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexed</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of indexed repositories </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>corrupted</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repositories that are currently corrupt </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"gitDirBytes"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexedLinesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"total"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloned"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloning"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"notCloned"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"failedFetch"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexed"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"corrupted"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>

        <section id="definition-RepositoryTextSearchIndexStatus" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryTextSearchIndexStatus">
          <div class="definition-group-name">

          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepositoryTextSearchIndexStatus</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>The status of a repository&#39;s text search index.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The date that the index was last updated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>contentByteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-BigInt"><code>BigInt!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The byte size of the original content. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>contentFilesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of files in the original content. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexByteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The byte size of the index. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexShardsCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of index shards. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>newLinesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> EXPERIMENTAL: The number of newlines appearing in the index. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>defaultBranchNewLinesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> EXPERIMENTAL: The number of newlines in the default branch. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>otherBranchesNewLinesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>

                    </tr>

  <span class="hljs-attr">"contentFilesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexByteSize"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexShardsCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"newLinesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"defaultBranchNewLinesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"otherBranchesNewLinesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span>

        <section id="definition-RepositoryTextSearchIndexedRef" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-RepositoryTextSearchIndexedRef">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">RepositoryTextSearchIndexedRef</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A Git ref (usually a branch) in a repository that is configured to be indexed for text search.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>ref</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitRef"><code>GitRef!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Git ref (usually a branch) that is configured to be indexed for text search. To find the specific commit SHA that was indexed, use RepositoryTextSearchIndexedRef.indexedCommit; this field's ref target resolves to the current target, not the target at the time of indexing. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexed</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether a text search index exists for this ref. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>current</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the text search index is of the current commit for the Git ref. If false, the index is stale. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexedCommit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-GitObject"><code>GitObject</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The indexed Git commit (which may differ from the ref's current target if the index is out of date). If indexed is false, this field's value is null. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>skippedIndexed</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SkippedIndexed"><code>SkippedIndexed</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> EXPERIMENTAL: Information about the files that were not indexed. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"ref"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitRef</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexed"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"current"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexedCommit"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">GitObject</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"skippedIndexed"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">SkippedIndexed</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-SavedSearch" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-SavedSearch">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">SavedSearch</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A saved search query, defined in settings.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique ID of this saved query. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>description</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The description. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The query. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>notify</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not to notify the owner of the saved search via email. This owner is either a single user, or every member of an organization that owns the saved search. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>notifySlack</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not to notify on Slack. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>namespace</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Namespace"><code>Namespace!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user or org that owns this saved search. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>slackWebhookURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The Slack webhook URL associated with this saved search, if any. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>

                <h5>Description</h5>

        <section id="definition-SearchResultMatch" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-SearchResultMatch">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">SearchResultMatch</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A match in a search result. Matches make up the body content of a search result.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> URL for the individual result match. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>body</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Markdown"><code>Markdown!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A markdown string containing the preview contents of the result match. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>highlights</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Highlight"><code>[Highlight!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of highlights that specify locations of matches of the query in the body. Each highlight is a line number, character offset, and length. Currently, highlights are only displayed on match bodies that are code blocks. If the result body is a code block, exclude the markdown code fence lines in the line and character count. Leave as an empty list if no highlights are available. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">

  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Markdown</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"highlights"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Highlight</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>

        <section id="definition-SearchResults" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-SearchResults">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">SearchResults</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Search results.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>results</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SearchResult"><code>[SearchResult!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The results. Inside each SearchResult there may be multiple matches, e.g. a FileMatch may contain multiple line matches. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>matchCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The total number of matches returned by this search. This is different than the length of the results array in that e.g. a single results array entry may contain multiple matches. For example, the results array may contain two file matches and this field would report 6 ("3 line matches per file") while the length of the results array would report 3 ("3 FileMatch results"). Typically, 'approximateResultCount', not this field, is shown to users. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name="" class="definition-deprecated"><span class="property-name"><code>resultCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED: Renamed to 'matchCount' for less ambiguity. <span class="deprecation-reason">renamed to matchCount for less ambiguity</span>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>approximateResultCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The approximate number of results. This is like the length of the results array, except it can indicate the number of results regardless of whether or not the limit was hit. Currently, this is represented as e.g. "5+" results. This string is typically shown to users to indicate the true result count. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>limitHit</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not the results limit was hit. In paginated requests, this field is always false. Use 'pageInfo.hasNextPage' instead. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>sparkline</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>[Int!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Integers representing the sparkline for the search results. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repositories</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>[Repository!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Repositories from results. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>repositoriesCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of repositories that had results (for clients that just wish to know how many without querying the, sometimes extremely large, list). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>cloning</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>[Repository!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Repositories that are busy cloning onto gitserver. In paginated search requests, some repositories may be cloning. These are reported here and you may choose to retry the paginated request with the same cursor after they have cloned OR you may simply continue making further paginated requests and choose to skip the cloning repositories. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>missing</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>[Repository!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Repositories or commits that do not exist. In paginated search requests, some repositories may be missing (e.g. if Sourcegraph is aware of them but is temporarily unable to serve them). These are reported here and you may choose to retry the paginated request with the same cursor and they may no longer be missing OR you may simply continue making further paginated requests and choose to skip the missing repositories. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>timedout</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Repository"><code>[Repository!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Repositories or commits which we did not manage to search in time. Trying again usually will work. In paginated search requests, this field is not relevant. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>indexUnavailable</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> DEPRECATED: This field is not used in known clients, and will always return <code>false</code>. True if indexed search is enabled but was not available during this search. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>alert</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SearchAlert"><code>SearchAlert</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> An alert message that should be displayed before any results. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>elapsedMilliseconds</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The time it took to generate these results. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>dynamicFilters</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SearchFilter"><code>[SearchFilter!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Dynamic filters generated by the search results </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"results"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">FileMatch</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"matchCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"resultCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"approximateResultCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"limitHit"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"sparkline"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repositories"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repositoriesCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"cloning"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"missing"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"timedout"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Repository</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"indexUnavailable"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">true</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"alert"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">SearchAlert</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"elapsedMilliseconds"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"dynamicFilters"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">SearchFilter</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
