          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">TreeEntry</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A file, directory, or other tree entry.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties definition-fields doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full path (relative to the repository root) of this tree entry. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base name (i.e., file name only) of this tree entry. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isDirectory</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether this tree entry is a directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL to this tree entry (using the input revision specifier, which may not be immutable). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The canonical URL to this tree entry (using an immutable revision specifier). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URLs to this tree entry on external services. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>symbols</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SymbolConnection"><code>SymbolConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Symbols defined in this file or directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n symbols from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>query</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return symbols matching the query.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>submodule</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Submodule"><code>Submodule</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Submodule metadata if this tree points to a submodule </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether this tree entry is a single child </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n files in the tree.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursive</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Recurse into sub-trees.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>recursiveSingleChild</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>

                      </td>

                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>

  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"canonicalURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"externalURLs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ExternalLink</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"symbols"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">SymbolConnection</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"submodule"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">Submodule</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>

                        <div class="field-arguments">

                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n external accounts from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>session</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Session"><code>Session!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user's currently active session. Only the currently authenticated user can access this field. Site admins are not able to access sessions for other users. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>viewerCanAdminister</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the viewer has admin privileges on this user. The user has admin privileges on their own user, and site admins have admin privileges on all users. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>viewerCanChangeUsername</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the viewer can change the username of this user. The user can change their username unless auth.disableUsernameChanges is set. Site admins can always change the username of any user. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>surveyResponses</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-SurveyResponse"><code>[SurveyResponse!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user's survey responses. Only the user and site admins can access this field. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>databaseID</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique numeric ID for the user. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>namespaceName</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The name of this user namespace's component. For users, this is the username. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>invitableCollaborators</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Person"><code>[Person!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> EXPERIMENTAL: Collaborators who can be invited to Sourcegraph. This typically comes from a few repositories this user has access to, and is derived from recent commit history of those. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>teams</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-TeamConnection"><code>TeamConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> All the teams this user is a direct member of. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n teams from the list.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Opaque pagination cursor.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>search</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Optionally apply a text search filter over the results.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>

                      <td>

                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A user&#39;s email address.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>email</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The email address. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isPrimary</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the email address is the user's primary email address. Currently this is defined as the earliest email address associated with the user, preferring verified emails to unverified emails. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>verified</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the email address has been verified by the user. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>verificationPending</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the email address is pending verification. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>user</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-User"><code>User!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user associated with this email address. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>viewerCanManuallyVerify</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether the viewer has privileges to manually mark this email address as verified (without the user going through the normal verification process). Only site admins have this privilege. </td>
                    </tr>

                </table>

                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>codeIntelligenceActions</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of code intelligence actions that the user has performed. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>findReferencesActions</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The number of find-refs actions that the user has performed. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastActiveTime</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The last time the user was active (any action, any platform). </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>lastActiveCodeHostIntegrationTime</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The last time the user was active on a code host integration. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"searchQueries"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"pageViews"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"codeIntelligenceActions"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">987</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"findReferencesActions"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"lastActiveTime"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"lastActiveCodeHostIntegrationTime"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-VirtualFile" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-VirtualFile">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">VirtualFile</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A virtual file is an arbitrary file that is generated in memory.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>path</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The full path (relative to the root) of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The base name (i.e., file name only) of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>isDirectory</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> False because this is a file, not a directory. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>content</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The content of this file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return file content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return file content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>byteSize</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file size in bytes. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Total line count for the file. Returns 0 for binary files. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>binary</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Whether or not it is binary. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>richHTML</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The file rendered as rich HTML, or an empty string if it is not a supported rich file type. This HTML string is already escaped and thus is always safe to render. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return richHTML content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Not implemented. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>canonicalURL</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Not implemented. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>externalURLs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalLink"><code>[ExternalLink!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Not implemented. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>highlight</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightedFile"><code>HighlightedFile!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Highlight the file. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>disableTimeout</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean!</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>highlightLongLines</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>If highlightLongLines is true, lines which are longer than 2000 bytes are highlighted. 2000 bytes is enabled. This may produce a significant amount of HTML which some browsers (such as Chrome, but not Firefox) may have trouble rendering efficiently.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>format</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-HighlightResponseFormat"><code>HighlightResponseFormat</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Specifies which format/highlighting technique to use.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>startLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return highlight content starting at line &quot;startLine&quot;. A value &lt;= 0 will be the start of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>endLine</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Return highlight content ending at line &quot;endLine&quot;. A value &lt; 0 or &gt; totalLines will set endLine to the end of the file. Warning: Pagination only works with the HTML_PLAINTEXT format type at the moment.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"isDirectory"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"byteSize"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalLines"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"binary"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-literal"><span class="hljs-keyword">false</span></span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"richHTML"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"canonicalURL"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"externalURLs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">ExternalLink</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"highlight"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">HighlightedFile</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-Webhook" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-Webhook">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">Webhook</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>Represents an incoming webhook from a code host.</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>id</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ID"><code>ID!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The unique ID of the webhook. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>uuid</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user facing UUID of the webhook. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>url</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URL of the webhook in the instance. This is the location where we expect to receive payloads. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>name</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Descriptive webhook name. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>codeHostKind</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-ExternalServiceKind"><code>ExternalServiceKind!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The kind of code host sending payloads. (eg. GitHub, GitLab) </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>codeHostURN</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The URN of the code host instance. (eg. <a href="https://gitlab.com">https://gitlab.com</a>) </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>secret</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Optional secret. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The last time this webhook was updated. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>updatedBy</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-User"><code>User</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user who last updated this webhook. Null if the user was deleted or if the webhook hasn't been updated yet. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>createdAt</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> When the webhook was created. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>createdBy</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-User"><code>User</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The user who created this webhook. Null if the user was deleted. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-has-field-arguments">
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>webhookLogs</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-WebhookLogConnection"><code>WebhookLogConnection!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The logs related to this webhook. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr class="row-field-arguments">
                      <td colspan="2">
                        <div class="field-arguments">
                          <h5 class="field-arguments-heading"> Arguments </h5>
                          <div class="field-argument-list">
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>first</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Returns the first n webhook logs.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>after</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-String"><code>String</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Opaque pagination cursor.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>onlyErrors</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Boolean"><code>Boolean</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs that resulted in errors.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>since</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs on or after this time.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="field-argument">
                              <h6 class="field-argument-name"><span class="property-name"><code>until</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-DateTime"><code>DateTime</code></a></span>
                              </h6>
                              <p>Only include webhook logs on or before this time.</p>
                            </div>
                          </div>
                        </div>
                      </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"4"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"uuid"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"codeHostKind"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"AWSCODECOMMIT"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"codeHostURN"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"abc123"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"secret"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"xyz789"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updatedAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updatedBy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">User</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"createdAt"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">"2007-12-03T10:15:30Z"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"createdBy"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">User</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"webhookLogs"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">WebhookLogConnection</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </section>
        <section id="definition-WebhookConnection" class="definition definition-object" data-traverse-target="definition-WebhookConnection">
          <div class="definition-group-name">
            <a href="#group-Types">Types</a>
          </div>
          <h2 class="definition-heading">WebhookConnection</h2>
          <div class="doc-row">
            <div class="doc-copy">
              <div class="definition-description doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Description</h5>
                <p>A list of webhooks</p>
              </div>
              <div class="definition-properties doc-copy-section">
                <h5>Fields</h5>
                <table>
                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Field Name</th>
                      <th>Description</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>nodes</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Webhook"><code>[Webhook!]!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> A list of webhooks. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>totalCount</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-Int"><code>Int!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> The total number of webhooks in the connection. </td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td data-property-name=""><span class="property-name"><code>pageInfo</code></span> - <span class="property-type"><a href="#definition-PageInfo"><code>PageInfo!</code></a></span>
                      </td>
                      <td> Pagination information. </td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>
            </div>
            <div class="doc-examples">
              <div class="example-section example-section-is-code">
                <h5>Example</h5>
                <html>
                  <head></head>
                  <body><pre><code class="hljs language-json"><span class="hljs-punctuation">{</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"nodes"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-punctuation">[</span><span class="hljs-string">Webhook</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">]</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"totalCount"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-number">123</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">,</span>
  <span class="hljs-attr">"pageInfo"</span><span class="hljs-punctuation">:</span> <span class="hljs-string">PageInfo</span>
<span class="hljs-punctuation">}</span>
</code></pre>
                  </body>
                </html>
              </div>
